meanings.sent1: I summated the scores of all my quizzes to find my total grade.
meanings.sent2: She summated the prices of all the items in her shopping cart.
meanings.sent3: The teacher summated the number of correct answers to determine the winner.
meanings.sent4: The accountant summated the expenses to present a final report.
meanings.sent5: The detective summated the clues to solve the mystery.

meanings.sent1: We summated our efforts to complete the project on time.
meanings.sent2: The chef summated various ingredients to create a delicious dish.
meanings.sent3: The team summated their skills to tackle the challenging task.
meanings.sent4: The artist summated different colors to paint a beautiful picture.
meanings.sent5: The friends summated their ideas to plan a fun weekend getaway.

meanings.definition: To reach a final conclusion or result
meanings.sent1: After hours of discussion, we summated that it was best to postpone the event.
meanings.sent2: The jury summated the evidence and delivered their verdict.
meanings.sent3: The siblings summated their arguments and decided to compromise.
meanings.sent4: The scientist summated the data and made a groundbreaking discovery.
meanings.sent5: The negotiators summated their positions and reached a mutual agreement.
